forces.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !  ===================================================================
00002 !
00003 !                              FORCES
00004 !
00005 !   $Revision$
00006 !
00007 !   Calculate forces from interaction list:
00008 !     nterm(i) = terms
00009 !   Pseudoparticles are given by: intlist(j,i), j=1,nterm(i);
00010 !
00011 !
00012 !   ** Returns fields Ex, Ey, Ez and potential pot excluding external terms **
00013 !
00014 !
00015 !  ===================================================================
00016 
00017 
00018 subroutine forces(p_start,p_finish,delta_t, t_domain,t_build,t_prefetch, t_walk, t_walkc, t_force)
00019 
00020   use physvars
00021   !  use treevars
00022   use utils
00023   implicit none
00024   include 'mpif.h'
00025 
00026   real, intent(in) :: delta_t
00027   integer, intent(in) :: p_start,p_finish  ! min, max particle nos.
00028 
00029   integer, parameter :: nshortm=1000
00030   integer, parameter :: nintm=2000  ! max interaction list length - need to match up with tree setup
00031   integer, parameter :: npassm=100000 ! Max # passes - will need npp/nshortm
00032 
00033   integer :: p, i, j, npass, jpass, ip1, nps,  max_npass,nshort_list, ipe
00034   real :: t_domain, t_build, t_prefetch, t_walk, t_walkc, t_force, ttrav, tfetch, t1, t2, t3  ! timing integrals
00035   real :: tb1, tb2, td1, td2, tp1, tp2
00036   integer :: pshortlist(nshortm),nshort(npassm),pstart(npassm), nterm(nshortm), nodelist(nintm,nshortm)! work balance arrays
00037   real :: work_loads(n_cpu),npps(n_cpu)  ! Work load & Particle distrib amoung PEs
00038   integer :: hashaddr ! Key address 
00039 
00040   integer :: max_local,  timestamp, max_list_length
00041   integer :: ierr
00042 
00043   real :: fsx, fsy, fsz, phi, phi_coul, ex_coul, ey_coul, ez_coul
00044   real :: ax_ind, ay_ind, az_ind, bx_ind, by_ind, bz_ind
00045   real :: Epon_x, Epon_y, Epon_z, Phipon, ex_em, ey_em, ez_em, bx_em, by_em, bz_em
00046   real :: xd, yd, zd  ! positions relative to centre of laser spot
00047   real :: work_local, load_average, load_integral, total_work, average_work
00048   integer :: total_parts
00049   integer ::  nfetch_total, nreqs_total, maxtraverse, maxships, sumships
00050   character(30) :: cfile, ccol1, ccol2
00051   character(4) :: cme
00052   integer :: key2addr        ! Mapping function to get hash table address from key
00053 
00054 
00055 
00056   call cputime(td1)
00057   call tree_domains(xl,yl,zl)    ! Domain decomposition: allocate particle keys to PEs
00058 
00059   call cputime(tb1)
00060   call tree_build      ! Build trees from local particle lists
00061   call tree_branches   ! Determine and concatenate branch nodes
00062   call tree_fill       ! Fill in remainder of local tree
00063   call tree_properties ! Compute multipole moments for local tree
00064   call cputime(tp1)
00065   if (n_cpu>1) call tree_prefetch(itime)
00066   call cputime(tp2)
00067 
00068   t_domain = tb1-td1
00069   t_build = tp1-tb1
00070   t_prefetch = tp2-tp1
00071   t_walk=0.
00072   t_walkc=0.
00073   t_force=0.
00074   max_local = 0   ! max length of interaction list
00075   max_list_length = 0
00076   work_local = 0  ! total workload
00077   maxtraverse=0   ! max # traversals
00078   maxships=0      ! max # multipole shipments/traversal
00079   sumships=0      ! total # multipole shipments/iteration
00080 
00081   nfetch_total=0     ! Zero key fetch counters if prefetch mode off
00082   nreqs_total=0
00083 
00084   !  # passes needed to process all particles
00085   nshort_list =nshortm/4 
00086   npass = max(1,npart_total/n_cpu/nshort_list)   ! ave(npp)/nshort_list   - make nshort_list a power of 2
00087   load_average = SUM(work(1:npp))/npass   ! Ave. workload per pass: same for all PEs if already load balanced
00088   nshort(1:npass+1) = 0
00089 
00090   load_integral = 0.
00091   jpass = 1
00092   pstart(jpass) = 1
00093   do i=1,npp
00094      load_integral = load_integral + work(i)   ! integrate workload
00095 
00096      if (i-pstart(jpass) + 1 == nshortm) then ! Need to check that nshort < nshortm
00097         write(*,*) 'Warning from PE: ',my_rank,' # parts on pass ',jpass,' in shortlist exceeds array limit ',nshortm
00098         write(*,*) 'Putting spill-over into following pass'
00099         nshort(jpass) = nshortm
00100         jpass = jpass + 1
00101         pstart(jpass) = i+1
00102 
00103      else if (load_integral >= load_average * jpass .or. i==npp ) then
00104         nshort(jpass) = i-pstart(jpass) + 1
00105         jpass = jpass + 1
00106         pstart(jpass) = i+1
00107 
00108      endif
00109   end do
00110 
00111 
00112   if (jpass-1 > npass ) then
00113      write(*,*) 'PE',my_rank,' missed some:',nshort(npass+1)
00114      if (nshort(npass) + nshort(npass+1) <= nshortm) then
00115         nshort(npass) = nshort(npass) + nshort(npass+1)
00116      else
00117         npass = npass+1
00118      endif
00119   endif
00120 
00121   if (db_level>2)   write (ifile_cpu,*) 'Shortlists: ',(nshort(j),j=1,npass+1)
00122 
00123   max_npass = npass
00124 
00125   ip1 = 1
00126 
00127 
00128   do jpass = 1,max_npass
00129      !  make short-list
00130      nps = nshort(jpass)
00131      ip1 = pstart(jpass)
00132      pshortlist(1:nps) = (/ (ip1+i-1, i=1,nps) /)
00133 
00134      if (db_level>2) then
00135         write(*,*) 'pass ',jpass,' of ',max_npass,': # parts ',ip1,' to ',ip1+nps-1
00136         write(ifile_cpu,*) 'pass ',jpass,' # parts ',ip1,' to ',ip1+nps-1
00137      endif
00138 
00139      !  build interaction list: 
00140      ! tree walk creates intlist(1:nps), nodelist(1:nps) for particles on short list
00141 
00142      call tree_walk(pshortlist,nps,jpass,theta,itime,beam_config,ttrav,tfetch)
00143      t_walk = t_walk + ttrav  ! traversal time (serial)
00144      t_walkc = t_walkc + tfetch  ! multipole swaps
00145 
00146      call cputime(t2)   ! timing
00147      do i = 1, nps
00148 
00149         p = pshortlist(i)    ! local particle index
00150         ! zero field sums
00151         Ex(p) = 0.
00152         Ey(p) = 0.
00153         Ez(p) = 0.
00154         pot(p) = 0.
00155 
00156 
00157         if (coulomb) then
00158            !  compute Coulomb fields and potential of particle p from its interaction list
00159            call sum_force(p, nterm(i), nodelist( 1:nterm(i),i), eps, ex_coul, ey_coul, ez_coul, phi_coul, work(p))
00160 
00161            pot(p) = pot(p) + force_const * phi_coul
00162            Ex(p) = Ex(p) + force_const * ex_coul
00163            Ey(p) = Ey(p) + force_const * ey_coul
00164            Ez(p) = Ez(p) + force_const * ez_coul
00165         endif
00166 
00167 
00168         work_local = work_local+nterm(i)
00169      end do
00170 
00171      call cputime(t3)   ! timing
00172      t_force = t_force + t3-t2
00173 
00174      max_local = max( max_local,maxval(nterm(1:nps)) )  ! Max length of interaction list
00175 
00176   end do
00177 
00178 
00179 
00180 
00181 
00182   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(max_local, max_list_length, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_MAX,  MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00183   call MPI_GATHER(work_local, 1, MPI_REAL8, work_loads, 1, MPI_REAL8, 0,  MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )  ! Gather work integrals
00184   call MPI_GATHER(npp, 1, MPI_INTEGER, npps, 1, MPI_INTEGER, 0,  MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )  ! Gather particle distn
00185 
00186   timestamp = itime + itime_start
00187 
00188   if (my_rank ==0 .and. mod(itime,iprot)==0) then
00189      total_work = SUM(work_loads)
00190      average_work = total_work/n_cpu
00191      cme = achar(timestamp/1000+48) // achar(mod(timestamp/100,10)+48) &
00192           // achar(mod(timestamp/10,10)+48) // achar(mod(timestamp,10)+48) 
00193      cfile="load_"//cme//".dat"
00194      total_parts=SUM(npps)
00195      open(60, file=cfile)
00196      write(60,'(a/a,i8,2(a,1pe15.6))')  '! Full balancing','Parts: ',total_parts,' Work: ',total_work, &
00197           ' Ave. work:',average_work        
00198      write(60,'(2i8,f12.3))')  (i-1,npps(i),work_loads(i)/average_work,i=1,n_cpu)
00199      close(60)
00200   endif
00201 
00202   if (db_level>2) then
00203      write (ifile_cpu,101)
00204      write (ifile_cpu,101) force_const, delta_t
00205 
00206      do i=p_start,p_finish
00207         write (ifile_cpu,102) pelabel(i), & 
00208              q(i), m(i), ux(i), Ex(i)
00209      end do
00210 
00211 101  format('Tree forces:'/'   p     owner    ux   Ex  ',2f8.2)
00212 102  format(1x,i7,4(1pe14.5))
00213 
00214   endif
00215 
00216 end subroutine forces
